localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
"NFTs make zero sense to me."

-guy who paid money to name a star after his girlfriend in high school
blogPost.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
"NFTs对我来说毫无意义。"

-一个花钱用高中女友的名字给明星起名的人。

"NFTs對我來說毫無意義。"

-一個花錢用高中女友的名字給明星起名的人。
